io.flic.fliclib.javaclient

Class ButtonScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.flic.fliclib.javaclient.ButtonScanner

  • public abstract class ButtonScanner
extends java.lang.Object
    Button scanner class. Inherit this class and override the onAdvertisementPacket(Bdaddr, String, int, boolean, boolean) method. Then add this button scanner to a FlicClient using FlicClient.addScanner(ButtonScanner) to start it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ButtonScanner() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void onAdvertisementPacket(Bdaddr bdaddr, java.lang.String name, int rssi, boolean isPrivate, boolean alreadyVerified)
      This will be called for every received advertisement packet from a Flic button.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ButtonScanner

    • Method Detail

      • onAdvertisementPacket

        public abstract void onAdvertisementPacket(Bdaddr bdaddr,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         int rssi,
                         boolean isPrivate,
                         boolean alreadyVerified)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        This will be called for every received advertisement packet from a Flic button.
        Parameters:
        bdaddr - Bluetooth address
        name - Advertising name
        rssi - RSSI value in dBm
        isPrivate - The button is private and won't accept new connections from non-bonded clients
        alreadyVerified - The server has already verified this button, which means you can connect to it even if it's private
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
